author: vors
body:
dotnet starts to error out because runtime is passed

I was trying to find a good place in the docs to document `Start-PSBuild -SMAOnly`, but cannot find it. @SteveL-MSFT do you have suggestions?

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @vors we should probably have comment based help

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
Yes, probably that's the right way to go about it.
Does this PR need any changes?

title: Fix Start-PSBuild -SMAOnly with the latest dotnet cli
